page.title: 06Shops in Monks Kirby
page.content: Mr.Mason is now the occupant of what was the old post office.The building is 150 years old and has a thatched roof which was put on in 1976.The new Post Office is across the road from the original site and serves as a general store as well as the Post Office.{The Post Office / General {store}fulfils a very important role being the only permanent shop of this kind in the village.A number of{mobile {shops}provide goods for the villagers such as the{Fishmonger}and{Grocer although many people in the village prefer to buy their vegetables from the local{Market Gardener,(George {Busby)}who grows and sells most kinds of vegetables.Other mobile services which come into the village are the {Library van}and the{School Dentist.
